aiSuggestion.subtitle: QUICK AI PICKS FOR YOU
aiSuggestion.title: What are you in the mood to eat?

input.placeholder: Tell the chef what you're craving...

info.generic: Recommendations are based on the digital menu.

intro.suffix: I’ll help you find the perfect dish.

aiAssistantContent.noCreditsTitle: The AI assistant is currently unavailable

hero.heading: Smart technology for serious restaurateurs.
hero.subheading: Dazzle guests with rich storytelling around your signature dishes while the AI assistant reads their tastes, dietary needs, and mood to surface the perfect recommendation in seconds.

highlights.title: Delight guests and empower your team.

instantMenu.title: Instant Menu Updates
instantMenu.body: Publish seasonal dishes, sold-out items, or dynamic pricing in seconds without reprinting any paper menus.

aiConcierge.title: AI Concierge
aiConcierge.body: Help guests discover dishes through natural language questions and dietary filters powered by our AI assistant.

insights.title: Personalized AI Assistant
insights.body: Launch a custom AI agent in your brand voice that chats with guests, answers every question, and feeds you insights you can instantly turn into new offers.

blog.title: The Future of Smart Restaurant Menus

aiVsQr.title: Why AI-powered menus outperform static QR menus
aiVsQr.excerpt: Static QR menus only display dishes. Smart Menu actively guides guests with personalized recommendations, helping them decide faster and order more.

upsell.title: Turn indecision into higher average orders
upsell.excerpt: An AI assistant suggests dishes based on mood, dietary needs, and preferences — reducing hesitation and increasing upsells naturally.

contact.title: Ready to serve your guests?
contact.body: Tell us about your concept, audience, and challenges. We'll tailor a Smart Menu rollout that feels like a natural extension of your brand.

hero.title: A digital menu that works for you
hero.description: Smart Menu connects the QR menu, AI assistant, and revenue analytics in one automated platform.

upload.title: 1. Upload menu & branding
upload.body: Import PDF, Excel, or CMS and we auto-structure every dish, allergen, and visual.

qr.title: 2. Guests scan the QR
qr.body: Each QR is localized (MK, SQ, EN) and stays available offline thanks to the PWA cache.

assistant.title: 3. AI assistant sells
assistant.body: Guests receive personalized pairings, upsell and cross-sell suggestions based on popularity and margin.

insights.title: 4. You get the insights
insights.body: A morning email with top sellers, average check, and stockouts keeps the whole team aligned.

comparison.title: Why is it better than a classic QR menu?
items: It’s not just a PDF inside a QR
AI that sells instead of the waiter

howItWorks.localSeo: Smart Menu is the digital menu solution for Macedonia, built for restaurants, cafés, and hotels that want a modern, intelligent system.

hero.title: Pro plans for any hospitality concept
hero.description: Pay per venue and unlock unlimited languages, media, and push campaigns.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: For small cafés and bars that want a modern QR menu.

pro.name: Pro (Most popular)
pro.description: For restaurants focused on increasing the average check size.

roi.title: Why it pays for itself
items: Average check grows 18% thanks to AI upsell.
Eliminate all menu printing and design costs.
60%+ of guests pick the recommended dish.

faq.question: Is there a setup fee?
faq.answer: No. Implementation is free at the moment and takes up to 3 business days.

faq.question: Can I pause the subscription?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s a month-to-month agreement. Pause or cancel anytime.

faq.question: Do you support multiple languages?
faq.answer: Smart Menu auto-translates menu content into Macedonian, Albanian, and English.

aiCredits.title: AI Credits
aiCredits.description: Pay only when guests chat with the assistant. Credits never expire—top up a new pack whenever you consume them.

hero.title: Digital QR menu with an AI assistant, built in Macedonia
hero.description: Smart Menu was created by a team passionate about simplifying hospitality through technology. Our goal is to make food discovery easier for guests and more efficient for restaurants.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Our mission is to help local restaurants increase sales and deliver a better digital experience for their guests.

founder.title: Founder note
founder.body: Smart Menu is initiated and developed by Stefan Gjorgjevski. The idea was born from the need for guests to choose meals more easily while restaurateurs manage menus through a modern, simple workflow.
